entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
